# cloudca_ssh_key (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **environment_id** (String) ID of environment where the SSH key should be created
- **name** (String) Name of the SSH Key
- **public_key** (String)

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
